title: Attendance
abstract: Opening:  When you die she will bury you in some out of the way place and tend to you in the way only the mourning can tend the dead.  There will be rosemary and wildflowers and nettles growing there, where you will be buried.  Complicated plants.  Useful.  By useful I mean like the brilliance of light or like sudden, primordial rain
